Hello Wolfgang, this is very interesting, can you say more? Is this
something already known in the community? Are the details written up
anywhere?

Noah

On Mon, Jul 16, 2018 at 11:03 AM Wolfgang Freudenberger wolfree@...
[archive-crawler] <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

>
> I am using it with a virtual display since I want to crawl ajaxtriggered
> events. If you go with headless, you are not able to get ALL triggers for
> JS or AJAX.
>
>

--00000000000032514c0571c13bff
